docs.lead_paragraph: THANKS to modern science, the diseases that killed our grandfathers have less and less terrors for us.

headline.main: SCIENCE ATTACKS SLOW ILLS OF OLD AGE; How the Large Gift of the Lasker Foundation Is to Be Used in a Fight on the "Degenerative Diseases," the Chief Unconquered Enemies of Long Life Capital Assists Science. ATTACK ON OLD AGE ILLS Old Age Comes Too Soon. Statistical Surveys. Diagnostic Surveys.

docs.abstract: Feature article on Lasker Foundation's proposed fight on old-age diseases
docs.snippet: THANKS to modern science, the diseases that killed our grandfathers have less and less terrors for us.
